title: Executive Order 5336-Coal Land Restoration, Utah No. 48
content: So much of the order of withdrawal of July 7, 1910, made for the purpose of coal land classification, namely Utah No. 1, as affects the lands hereinafter described is hereby revoked for the reason that the Director of the Geological Survey has classified these lands. This revocation does not affect withdrawals or reservations other than as above set forth.
T. 41 S., R. 1 E., all of township.
T. 42 S., R. 1 E., secs. 1 to 6, inclusive;                           sec. 7, lots 1, 2, 3, and 4, E. ½ of W. ½.

T. 42 S., R. 2 E., secs. 1 to 4, inclusive;                           sec. 5, lots 1, 2, 3, and 4, S. ½ of N. ½;                           sec. 6, all;                           sec. 9, E. ½, E. ½ of NW. ¼;                           secs. 10 to 15, inclusive;                           sec. 16, E. ½ of NE. ¼;                           sec. 22, NE. ¼, NE. ¼ of NW. ¼, E. ½ of SE. ¼;                           secs. 23 to 25, inclusive;                           sec. 26, E. ½, N. ½ of NW. ¼;                           sec. 27, NE. ¼ of NE. ¼;                           sec. 35, E. ½;                           sec. 36, all.

T. 41 S., R. 1 W., sec. 1, all.                             sec. 2, all.                             sec. 3, lot 1, SE. ¼ of NE. ¼, E. ½ of SE. ¼;                             sec. 10, E. ½;                             secs. 11 to 14, inclusive;                             sec. 15, E. ½, NE. ¼ of SW. ¼, S. ½ of SW. ¼;                             sec. 21, E. ½ of NE. ¼, SE. ¼;                             secs. 22 to 27, inclusive;                             sec. 28, E. ½;                             sec. 33, NE¼, E. ½ of SE. ¼;                             secs. 34 to 36, inclusive.

T. 42 S., R. 1 W., secs. 1 to 3, inclusive;                             sec 4, lot 1, SE. ¼ of NE. ¼, E. ½ of SE. ¼;                             sec. 6, all;                             sec. 7, lots 1, 2, 3, and 4, N. ½ of NE. ¼, SW: ¼ of NE. ¼, E. ½ of W. ½, W. ½ of SE. ¼;                             sec. 9, NE. ¼ of NE. ¼;                             secs. 10 to 12, inclusive;                             sec. 13, N. ½;                             sec. 14, all;                             sec. 15, all;                             sec. 18, lots 1, 2, 3, and 4, E. ½ of W. ½;                             sec. 19, lots 1, 2, 3, and 4, E. ½ of W. ½.
citation: Herbert Hoover, Executive Order 5336-Coal Land Restoration, Utah No. 48 Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/372947
